persona.name: Ellis
persona.bio: Ellis, a 64-year-old full-time crypto trader, is renowned for their expert-level trading acumen and a cooperative spirit that encourages collaboration within the trading community. Known for their detail-oriented approach, Ellis meticulously analyzes market trends and data, ensuring each investment decision is grounded in thorough research and strategic foresight. Their dedication to precision and teamwork has earned them a respected place among peers in the crypto trading world.
